metadata.description: Professional Spring Boot Kotlin development skills for Clean Architecture, TDD, debugging, code review, and project initialization

plugins.name: spring-boot-kotlin-init
plugins.description: Initializes Spring Boot Kotlin projects with Clean Architecture principles. Use when users request to create a new Spring Boot project, initialize a backend project structure, or set up a Kotlin-based web application with best practices.

plugins.name: spring-boot-kotlin-architecture-design
plugins.description: Transform user requirements into detailed Clean Architecture design specifications for Spring Boot Kotlin projects. Designs domain models, database schemas, API endpoints, and business logic.

plugins.name: spring-boot-kotlin-tdd
plugins.description: Test-Driven Development for Spring Boot Kotlin projects. Generates comprehensive test suites and production-ready implementations with JUnit5 and MockK.

plugins.name: spring-boot-kotlin-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive code review and refactoring for Spring Boot Kotlin projects following Clean Code and Clean Architecture principles. Analyzes quality, performance, and security.

plugins.name: spring-boot-kotlin-systematic-debugging
plugins.description: Systematic 4-phase debugging process for Spring Boot Kotlin applications. Debug production issues, investigate bugs, and solve performance problems with structured methodology.
